title: @Riot Xayah & Rakan Gift error
body:
When trying to gift Xayah or Rakan with IP the error message: 'Your Friend's gift pool is not large enough to receive a mystery gift' pops up.
I did read that this problem has popped up in the past... just wanted to let Riot know asap before the LoL community explodes.

Cheers' 
H33P

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up and spreading the word!  <3  While the messaging is super confusing, it's only been coming up if you're trying to gift a friend who already has one of the champions.  Confirm with your friend, and let me know if you run into any issues.  Thanks again!

I think it was a minor bug that popped up. We were on voice chat, so made sure neither had the champs. It also specified the 'mystery champion' part, which should also not have been the problem as we have plenty of 'pool' room,but I think it had more to do with the technical side that Xayah and Rakan are "mystery champions" but with a 100% gift chance or whatever (hypothesis).

We were able to gift each other a bit later. So, all is well. Riot has produced some happy faces as these champs are awesome!
